wikipedia.title: Albanian nationalism in the Republic of Macedonia
wikipedia.summary: Albanian nationalism in the Republic of Macedonia came about during the Albanian nationalist movement which emerged as a response to the Eastern Crisis (1878) and proposed partitioning of Ottoman Albanian inhabited lands in the Balkans among neighbouring c

wikipedia.title: Albanian nationalism in Kosovo
wikipedia.summary: Albanian nationalism in Kosovo is the birthplace of the Albanian nationalist movement which emerged as a response to the Eastern Crisis of 1878.

wikipedia.title: Albanian nationalism in Albania
wikipedia.summary: Albanian nationalism is a general grouping of nationalist ideas and concepts generated by ethnic Albanians that were first formed in the 19th century during the Albanian National Awakening .

wikipedia.title: Blagaj massacre
wikipedia.summary: The Blagaj massacre was the mass killing of around 400 Serb civilians by the Croatian nationalist Ustaše movement on 9 May 1941, during World War II.

wikipedia.title: Operation Backstop
wikipedia.summary: Operation Backstop was a United Nations Protection Force (UNPROFOR) military plan designed to guard a portion of the United Nations Protected Areas (UNPAs) against attack by the Croatian Army (Hrvatska vojska – HV) during the Croatian War of Independence.

wikipedia.title: Operation Backstop

wikipedia.title: Battle of the Miljevci Plateau
wikipedia.summary: The Battle of the Miljevci Plateau was a clash of the Croatian Army (Hrvatska vojska - HV) and forces of the Republic of Serbian Krajina (RSK), fought on 21–23 June 1992, during the Croatian War of Independence.
